page.title: 06Health.
page.content: Most of the old people are fit because they go for long walks and go down to the beach.There is no doctor in the area so they have to telephone or visit him by car.If there is an accident they again rely on the telephone to get an ambulance. Maidencombe has mostly elderly people and they are generally well cared for. Some of them have meals on wheels and a community nurse often calls round. However,some people can afford to pay someone to come to cook their meals or clean for them.There is a health centre in St. Marychurch which serves the area.
